Public API

REST API overview

Base URL: https://aistatusdashboard.com/api/public/v1

Core endpoints

  • GET /status/summary
  • GET /status/health-matrix
  • GET /incidents
  • GET /metrics
  • POST /recommendations/fallback_plan
  • POST /policy/generate

Every response includes request_id, generated_at, evidence, andconfidence.

  • /openapi.yaml
